price: ߌߟߋ ߞߊ߫ ߞߌߢߍ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߟߋ߬ ߞߟߋ߫ ߸ ߓߊߏ߬ ߒ ߧߴߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ( ߟߊ߫ ߞߎ߬ߕߊ ) ߦߙߌߞߊߟߌ ߟߋ߫ ߞߊ߲߬ ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߞߋߟߋ߲ߞߋߟߋ߲߫
arabic: فَلَا تَعۡجَلۡ عَلَيۡهِمۡۖ إِنَّمَا نَعُدُّ لَهُمۡ عَدّٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: falā taʿjal ʿalayhim innamā naʿuddu lahum ʿaddan
